special_text:
If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere other than their hand, exile it instead.
[-1]: Target opponent discards a card, then you discard a card. Draw a card if you discarded the card with the highest mana value among those cards.
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Draw two cards for each player with one or fewer cards in hand.
